name: TiaLinx
overview: TiaLinx, Inc. has been involved with the development of state-of-the-art mm-Wave ultra wideband (UWB) RF imaging devices that can be used for variety of civilian and defense applications. The company has received numerous SBIR awards from AFRL (VSSS, VSSE), Navy (ONR), NSF, DARPA (STO, MTO), and Army (AMMO/CCS). TiaLinx was recognized as one of the top scientifically accomplished start-ups at the DARPATech 2005. TiaLinx was established in 2003 as a California corporation. The Company has received 41 patents and owns many more additional filed patent applications.

milestones.description: TiaLinx, Inc. Announces Launch of the Viper60-A, an Ultra Wideband Concealed Weapon Detector Operating in the V-band
milestones.source_description: TiaLinx, Inc. Announces Launch of the Viper60-A, an Ultra Wideband Concealed Weapon Detector Operating in the V-band
